NAME: ReactKarma
AUTHOR: Tobotimus
SHORT: A reddit-like karma system from reactions!
DESCRIPTION:
A karma system with discord reactions.
Set the upvote and downvote emojis in each server, reacting with those emojis gives/takes karma!
INSTALL_MSG:
Set the upvote and downvote emojis in each server with `[p]setupvote` and `[p]setdownvote`.
Check karma with `[p]karma` or `[p]karmaboard`.
